title: ADC is the easiest role in the game, even those 5 people said so. Here's the proof.
body:
You can clearly hear them saying 
" A D C, It's easy as 1 2 3 "  at some point in the song.

[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ho7796-au8U]

replies.body: support is the easiest role in the game. place a few wards and stand near your carry, boom you now know support

> [{quoted}](name=LastBreathX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=vfbGAvcd,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-08-09T14:16:35.507+0000)
>
> support is the easiest role in the game. place a few wards and stand near your carry, boom you now know support

Gonna be brutally honest and say you're completely wrong.

I know support isn't easy to play. But when you put it up against the roles I personally think it is the least challenging. Yes, I do know support isn't just place wards and look pretty, so don't take what I am saying the wrong way.

If I had to give an order to most challenging roles I think it'd be:

Jungle
ADC
Mid
Top
Support
i would say support is harder than top. probabaly more than adc sometimes too
ADC is high on my list because it takes a lot of mechanical skill to be a good ADC.
Lol, jungle is so easy. You get to free farm and have the least risk for getting kills/assist.

Junglers have to worry about way more things than a laner has to. They have to worry about keeping up in exp and gold for themselves, keeping their laners relevant in the game, and taking objectives. That's more than any other role I can say.
First off, it's the Jackson 5. Don't post if you don't even know what you're talking about. Also, it's "ABC" and not "ADC". You're 0-3 here.

are people actually taking this thread seriously? Did nobody get the..... nevermind.

There is no such thing as an easy role in this game. If I'm going to be honest, I would say that top lane is the easiest. Not to detract from the difficulty that top lane brings, ofcourse. There's just no such thing as an easy role. ADCs are always going to be public enemy number 1 to the opponent, and do require good positioning to not just feed horribly.

Adc isn't the easiest role by any means.
I find there's a lot more it just clicking the people on the screen.
If that's all you think it is, you're playing the game wrong :\
